explains: adj. 难对付的，棘手的；狡猾的，诡计多端的

sentences.en: It was a tricky problem but I think we've licked it.
sentences.cn: 这是一个棘手的问题，但我认为我们轻而易举地把它解决了。

sentences.en: He and I have talked through this whole tricky problem.
sentences.cn: 他和我已经详细讨论了这一整个棘手的问题。

sentences.en: It's a bit tricky at first till you get the hang of it.
sentences.cn: 它在一开始当你还没掌握它的窍门的时候有些棘手。
